turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want to order coffee from Starbuck's

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: OK, which Starbucks would you like to visit?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Which one is closest?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: The Starbucks on Statler Avenue is closest. Would you like directions?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, I know where that is.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: OK, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like a grande Iced Peppermint Mocha.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I'm sorry, that drink is seasonal and not currently available. Would you like to order something else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, how about an Iced Salted Caramel Mocha?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: OK, what size Iced Salted Caramel Mocha would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: A grande is fine.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: OK, a grande Iced Salted Caramel Mocha. What kind of milk would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What kinds are there?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: There's almond, coconut, nonfat...

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'll take coconut milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: OK, a grande Iced Salted Caramel Mocha with coconut milk. Would you like whipped cream?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Of course I do!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: OK, a grande Iced Salted Caramel Mocha with coconut milk and whipped cream. Would you like to order anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that'll do it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: OK, when would you like to pick it up?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: As soon as possible.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: OK, your grande Iced Salted Caramel Mocha with coconut milk and whipped cream will be ready in 20 minutes at Starbucks on Statler Avenue. It will cost $5.75, paying from your Starbucks app.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: OK, great!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Can I help you with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Nope, thanks!
